greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of the squarefree numbers: tau(A005117(n)).
comment: Also the number of cubefree numbers with the same squarefree kernel as the n-th squarefree number, see A073245.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A072048:=n->`if`(numtheory[issqrfree](n) = true, numtheory[tau](n), NULL); seq(A072048(k), k=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 13 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 09 2002
